snippet.title: Calling Home - Official Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Calling Home is a mix of resource management and adventure developed by Crystal Fox. Explore procedurally-generated planets with individual traits and repair your communication system. Automize & optimize the production of your newly built base with the help of your little AI companion M.A.R.S. and research several advanced technologies to improve your abilities and building options.
Calling Home is launching into Steam Early Access on December 15 2023 for PC.

Calling Home on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2367880/Calling_Home/


#resourcemanagement #adventuregame #craftingandbuilding #scifigame #indiegame #indiedev #lowpoly #earlyaccess
